title: Interacting Euclidean 3D Quantum Gravity
abstract: We show that Euclidean 3D-gravity coupled to a Gaussian scalar massive matter field in first-order dreibein formalism gives a quantum theory which has a finite perturbative expansion around a non-vanishing background. We also discuss a possible mechanism to generate a non-trivial background metric starting from Rovelli-Smolin's loop observables.
